Judul: The Change of Public Perception towards Alun-Alun Bandung as a City Center ( Procedia - Social and Behavioral Sciences 184 ( 2015 ) 135 ��� 143)
Abstrak: A struggle for Bandung’s identity has been reflected on the dilemmatic situation in its city center- Alun-Alun Bandung. AlunAlun has been known widely as a traditional form of indigenous city center in Indonesian city. Presently, Alun-Alun is no longer perceived as the representation of Bandung city center. As a result, public space in Bandung has become an empty landmark. Many questions have been arising regarding history is still a significance basis to build a city center image. This paper tries to visualize an ephemeral aspect of the city, seen differently through the time. A durational installation artwork is created by the author to convey an artistic critic that describes a destruction process of water to a soil, as a symbol of time that decays the meaning of Alun-Alun Bandung.
Kata Kunci: Alun-Alun Bandung; city center; virtual city; colonial town
